Self.Wiki: Determines the homing angle and speed parameters for a blade melee attack.

bModelUdTurn.Wiki: Tilt the model in the vertical movement direction

bStopForHitTarget.Wiki: Does it stop when it makes contact with the target?

bInheritRotAng.Wiki: Do you want to inherit the rotation angle from before the start of melee?

moveRotType.Wiki: How to correct vertical movement direction

turnSpeedDPS.Wiki: In degrees per second. -1 uses the character's velocity.

turnAccelDPSS.Wiki: -1 uses the character's velocity ^ 2. Also, 0 is treated as infinity (the speed is always the same as the angular velocity). In degrees per second ^ 2

udTurnSpeedDPS.Wiki: If -1, follow angular velocity: use the same value for left and right. In degrees per seconds.

udTurnAccelDPSS.Wiki: If -1, follow angular acceleration: use the same value for left and right. In degrees per second ^ 2

modelRotSpeedDegPerSec.Wiki: If it is 1, apply the value of the above-mentioned velocity. In degrees per second.
